1.content:
John carefully snuck into the girls locker room after school when the field hockey team had practice. It was, after all, his senior year, he had to do something to make it memorable. Holly had deeply pale skin, mixing rather nicely with her pale blue eyes and dark brown hair. Not too too thin, but she seemed by no means fat. She lifted her shirt off, reveling perfect breasts accented by her bra that was perhaps a little too small. This, however, was all he could see before seeing two other girls caught his eye. Miranda Jenks and Sara Gose. Miranda was a petite sophomore blonde with nicely tanned skin, and Sara was looked about the same, except she had pale skin, and always seemed to possess an inviting look in her eyes whereas Miranda seemed a little hesitant and shy. They both sat on the benches while peeling off their sweaty socks and rubbing their soles. John's attention was brought to a girl who had wrapped herself in a towel going to the shower stalls. Christine Pendeti had one of the most amazing pairs of legs he had ever seen. She was a junior with long light brown hair, hazel eyes, and nicely tanned skin. A little on the thin side, but still gorgeous. The fifth girl John saw was a little freshman new to the team. Jill Cratz was indeed cute. Her long dark brown hair and moderately fair skin blended nicely with her petite features. Her deep brown eyes that offered a look of innocence about them. A little thin, but certainly gorgeous soles.

John made the mistake of leaning in the trash can to try to get a better look at the girls. It was then he fell over, alerting everyone in the locker room to the presence of an unwelcome guest. "Well, well, well, what have we here?" Holly asked. "Well, girls, let's give him what he whats!"
